channel.title: CVE Feed for AcyMailing -- Newsletter via SMTP, Sendinblue, Sendgrid, Mailgun - AcyMailing SMTP Newsletter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AcyMailing -- Newsletter via SMTP, Sendinblue, Sendgrid, Mailgun - AcyMailing SMTP Newsletter

item.title: CVE-2021-24288|2024-08-03T19:28:23.248Z -- acymailing -- newsletter%20via%20smtp%2C%20sendinblue%2C%20sendgrid%2C%20mailgun%20-%20acymailing%20smtp%20newsletter
item.description: When subscribing using AcyMailing, the 'redirect' parameter isn't properly sanitized. Turning the request from POST to GET, an attacker can craft a link containing a potentially malicious landing page and send it to the victim.
